## jx upgrade crd

Upgrades the Jenkins X Custom Resource Definitions in the Kubernetes Cluster

### Synopsis

Upgrades the Jenkins X Custom Resource Definitions in the Kubernetes Cluster

```
jx upgrade crd [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Upgrades the Custom Resource Definitions
  jx upgrade crd
```
